Class Tar_TarFileSet<P>

java.lang.Object
  org.copalis.mkr.ant.AntRef<T>
      org.copalis.mkr.ant.AntElement<org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Tar.TarFileSet,P>
          mkr.ant.taskdefs.Tar_TarFileSet<P>

public class Tar_TarFileSet<P>
extends AntElement<org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Tar.TarFileSet,P>

This is a FileSet with the option to specify permissions and other attributes.

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Tar.TarFileSet)
